reviews.review: КЛАССНАЯ ИГРА НО ВАНЯ НЕ ХОЧЕТ В НЕЁ ИГРАТЬ, ДУМАЕТ ФАРТАНАЙТ ЛУТШЕ!!!!!

I hate the game I got with Premium and a day later I was banned for alleged hacking what I didn't do.

I really like this game but it makes me feel inferior to other people. I was always really bad at this game. I have worse reflexes than my great grand mother. I cannot remember which buttons I bind to my movement. I find myself struggling with my controller. I cannot distinguish enemies from my teammates. The only players that does not want to kick me from game are bots. My dream is to reach non-negative score in a game.
The Chernobyl nuclear disaster had less toxicity than this game.
